name: Premium Exercise Bike Pro
description: Stationary exercise bike with adjustable seat and multiple resistance levels.

name: Travel Yoga Mat
description: Lightweight and foldable yoga mat, perfect for travel and outdoor use. Made with a non-slip surface to ensure stability during stretches and poses.

description: High-performance treadmill with multiple speed settings and heart rate monitor.

description: Space-saving foldable treadmill with LED display and pulse sensors.

name: Compact Kettlebell Set
description: Compact kettlebell set with multiple weight options for varied workouts.

description: Adjustable incline bench suitable for a variety of weight exercises.

name: Heavy Resistance Bands Set
description: Set of 5 heavy-duty resistance bands with varied tension levels.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker Lite
description: Basic fitness tracker with step counter and heart rate monitor.

name: Power Resistance Band Set
description: Durable resistance bands for powerlifting and strength training. The set includes multiple bands with varying levels of resistance, suitable for different workout intensities.

name: Cast Iron Kettlebell 20kg
description: Durable cast iron kettlebell for strength training and conditioning.

name: Spin Bike with LCD Display
description: A commercial-grade spin bike equipped with an LCD display to track time, speed, distance, and calories burned. Designed for high-performance workouts at home or the gym.

name: Vinyl Dumbbells Set
description: Set of 6 vinyl-coated dumbbells for weight training and toning.

name: Compact Flat Bench
description: A sturdy flat bench designed for weightlifting, core exercises, and resistance training. Compact and easy to store, making it ideal for home gyms with limited space.

name: Minimalist Fitness Tracker
description: A sleek and minimalistic fitness tracker that monitors essential health metrics like heart rate, steps, and calories burned. Ideal for users looking for simplicity and efficiency.

name: Hex Dumbbells 15kg Pair
description: Hex-shaped rubber dumbbells for stability and ease of use. The ergonomic handles provide a secure grip, perfect for weight training and resistance exercises.

name: High-Intensity Spin Bike
description: Spin bike designed for high-intensity interval training with LCD monitor.

name: Advanced Treadmill Model Z
description: Advanced treadmill with built-in fitness programs and wireless connectivity.

name: Silent Exercise Bike X300
description: A quiet and smooth magnetic resistance bike with adjustable seat and handlebars. Perfect for home cardio workouts, ensuring minimal noise and maximum performance.

name: Eco-friendly Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat for enhanced grip during workouts.

name: Neoprene Dumbbells Set
description: A set of 8 neoprene-coated dumbbells, offering various weights for strength training. Their ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip, even during intense workouts.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker V2
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor and sleep analysis.

name: Extra Heavy Resistance Bands
description: Set of resistance bands with high tension, built for athletes looking to intensify their strength training. Suitable for pull-ups, muscle-ups, and mobility work.

name: Extra Thick Yoga Mat
description: Extra-thick mat for additional comfort during high-impact workouts.

name: Pull-Up Resistance Bands
description: Durable resistance bands designed for pull-ups and strength training.

name: Smart Fitness Watch Max
description: This advanced fitness watch tracks heart rate, sleep cycles, and workout metrics. Water-resistant and compatible with most smartphones, providing real-time health insights.

name: Yoga Mat with Alignment Lines
description: Yoga mat featuring alignment lines for precision in poses.

name: Pro Treadmill S900
description: A high-end treadmill equipped with a 15-inch interactive screen, live workout streaming, and incline settings. Designed for both casual and intense running sessions.

name: Folding Treadmill Lite
description: Compact folding treadmill with basic speed settings and a digital display. Ideal for small spaces and light jogging or walking routines at home.

name: Iron Kettlebell 25kg
description: Heavy-duty iron kettlebell for advanced strength training and full-body workouts. Its durable design ensures longevity, even with regular and rigorous use.

name: Flat Weight Bench
description: Flat weight bench perfect for dumbbell and barbell exercises.

name: Magnetic Resistance Bike
description: Exercise bike with magnetic resistance system and adjustable seat.

name: High-Density Yoga Mat
description: This yoga mat offers superior cushioning and durability, ideal for all types of floor exercises, including Pilates and core workouts. Made from eco-friendly materials.

description: Adjustable dumbbells with quick-lock mechanism for varied workouts.
